wikipedia_page.main: James Arthur Hutchinson (28 December 1915 – 1997) was an English footballer who spent the 1940s with Sheffield United, Bournemouth & Boscombe Athletic, Lincoln City and Oldham Athletic. He was the father of Barry Hutchinson, who was a footballer in the 1950s and 1960s. Both father and son finished a season as Lincoln City's top-scorer.
